cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.0.0)
project(amxxmodule_sdk)

set(AMXXMODULE_SDK_INCLUDE_PATHS
	${AMXXMODULE_SDK_MODULECONFIG_DIR}
	${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/include
)

set(AMXXMODULE_SDK_INCLUDE_PATHS
	${AMXXMODULE_SDK_INCLUDE_PATHS}
	PARENT_SCOPE
)

set(AMXXMODULE_SDK_RUNTIME_SOURCE_FILE
	${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/amxxmodule.cpp
)

set(AMXXMODULE_SDK_RUNTIME_SOURCE_FILE
	${AMXXMODULE_SDK_RUNTIME_SOURCE_FILE}
	PARENT_SCOPE
)

add_library(${PROJECT_NAME} STATIC 
	${AMXXMODULE_SDK_RUNTIME_SOURCE_FILE}
)

target_include_directories(${PROJECT_NAME} PUBLIC
	${AMXXMODULE_SDK_INCLUDE_PATHS}
)
